verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Why do you wait, dear brother, Oh, why do you tarry so long? Your Savior is waiting to give you A place in His sanctified throng.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Why not? why not? Why not come to Him now? Why not? why not? Why not come to Him now?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: What do you hope, dear brother, To gain by a further delay? There’s no one to save you but Jesus, There’s no other way but His way.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Do you not feel, dear brother, His Spirit now striving within? Oh, why not accept His salvation, And throw off your burden of sin?

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Why do your wait, dear brother? The harvest is passing away; Your Savior is longing to bless you, There are danger and death in delay.
